Summary._: TRACK REPLACEMENT  [2] No trains between Chambers St and Atlantic Av-Barclays Ctr [4] [A] [N] [Q] trains provide alternate service

Description._: TRACK REPLACEMENT  [2] No trains between Chambers St and Atlantic Av-Barclays Ctr [4] [A] [N] [Q] trains provide alternate service

LongDescription:
TRACK REPLACEMENT
[2] No trains between Chambers St and Atlantic Av-Barclays Ctr
[4] [A] [N] [Q] trains provide alternate service

Nights, 9:45 PM to 5 AM, Mon to Fri, until May 18

[2] service operates in two sections:
 1. Between 241 St and Chambers St, and via the [1] to/from South Ferry
 • Trains run local in both directions between 96 St and Chambers St.
 2. Between Atlantic Av-Barclays Ctr and Flatbush Av
• Trains from Flatbush Av skip Eastern Pkwy, Grand Army Plaza and Bergen St.

Travel Alternatives[TP]

[4] service operates to New Lots Av early.

For service between The Bronx and Brooklyn take the [4].
• Transfer between trains at 149 St-Grand Concourse and/or Franklin Av.

For service between Manhattan and Brooklyn take the [4] [N] or [Q].

Out-of-system transfer is available between South Ferry [1] [2] and Bowling Green [4] stations (request a transfer ticket).
• Transfer between [1] [2] and [R] trains at South Ferry/Whitehall St.

For service to Spring St, take the [A] to Canal St and transfer to an uptown [A] or [E].

Summary._: Rockaways Long-Term Flood Protection  [S] No Rockaway Park Shuttle service at Broad Channel - Take the [A] instead [A] No rush hour service  to/from  Rockaway Park-Beach 116 St

Description._: Rockaways Long-Term Flood Protection  [S] No Rockaway Park Shuttle service at Broad Channel - Take the [A] instead [A] No rush hour service  to/from  Rockaway Park-Beach 116 St

LongDescription:
Rockaways Long-Term Flood Protection
[S] No Rockaway Park Shuttle service at Broad Channel - Take the [A] instead
[A] No rush hour service to/from Rockaway Park-Beach 116 St

All times, until Friday May 18, 2018

[S] Rockaway Park Shuttle operates, approximately every 20 minutes, between
Rockaway Park-Beach 116 St and Beach 90 St and via the [A] to/from Far Rockaway-Mott Av.

For Broad Channel, take the [A], transfer to the [S] Rockaway Park Shuttle at Beach 67 St.

Alternate travel note for Broad Channel:
Q52-SBS, Q53-SBS, QM16 and QM17 service is also available at Cross Bay Blvd and Noel Rd.

Click here for additional details on this Flood Protection Project.

Summary._: TRACK REPLACEMENT  [R] Forest Hills-bound trains run express from Queens Plaza to 71 Av

Description._: TRACK REPLACEMENT  [R] Forest Hills-bound trains run express from Queens Plaza to 71 Av

LongDescription:
TRACK REPLACEMENT
[R] Forest Hills-bound trains run express from Queens Plaza to 71 Av

Evenings, 11:45 PM to 12:30 AM, Mon to Fri, Apr 23 - 27

Trains stop at Roosevelt Av.

For service to 36, Steinway, 46 Sts, Northern Blvd and 65 St, take the [R] to Roosevelt Av
and transfer to a Manhattan-bound [E] local.

For service to Elmhurst, Grand Avs, Woodhaven Blvd, 63 Dr and 67 Av, take the [R] to 71 Av
and transfer to Manhattan-bound [E] local.

For service from these stations, take the [E] or [R] to Roosevelt Av or Queens Plaza and transfer to a
Forest Hills-bound [R].
